wikipedia_page.main: William Forbes McIntosh (2 January 1879 – 15 January 1973) was a Scottish footballer who played as a left back or left half.He played club football for Third Lanark and Vale of Leven, and made one appearance for Scotland in 1905. With Third Lanark, McIntosh won the Scottish Football League title in 1903–04 and the Scottish Cup in 1905. He later emigrated to Canada.
